title: Longfellow House Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site: Teens
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Teens              Teens       Teen employment with the National Park Service! Get paid to work at a National Historic Site from July- August 2016.  APPLY NOW!  Â       Working at a historic site has a lot of benefits, including being paid! Depending on the position you apply for your work can range from maintaining historical grounds and facilities, to interacting with local to international people, to developing ways to engage your peers in the National Park Service. These positions are open to teens, ages 15-18. To learn more about employment opportunities follow the link to our detailed webpage.
